website_summaries.verdict: Cute robot nesting dolls are a great value and will appeal to robot fans of all ages.
pros: This nesting doll set is made of safe, durable plastic that won't shatter
The fun robot characters are small in size, so they're easy to travel with and the design works nicely as a decor item for a bedroom
cons: The smallest robot is a potential choking hazard for young children

customer_reviews.title: False advertising, misleading product photo
customer_reviews.text: The robots I received are not the ones pictured. We already own the robots that are pictured here. I ordered these as a gift for a kid who played with them at our house and wanted some. However, the ones we received are a dull gray color. The robots pictured (and the ones we already have) are painted a shiny chrome. These look and feel cheap by comparison. They're like Easter eggs. If they're going to sell these, they need to update the picture. It's false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Dugger

customer_reviews.title: Matte
customer_reviews.text: Cute but not as pictured. I received matte grey robots. The robots are plastic and similar to a mid-quality Easter egg.
customer_reviews.author: Mehlennial

customer_reviews.title: We love this toy
customer_reviews.text: We have owned these for 5 years and through 3 kids. I threw away the smallest robot when it arrived, because it was a choking hazard, but the others are still played with and fully functional! We love this toy. It is sturdier than easter egg plastic, though it probably would break if you stepped on it...so just don't!
customer_reviews.author: R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: My niece loves it.
customer_reviews.text: They strike me as a little stronger than the plastic easter eggs described by another reviewer, though not by much. She is four, and she decided the second-to-largest one is the Dad of the "Robot family" because "He's all grumpy!" I made the mistake of telling her the one with the radiation symbol (they're all different and very cute) was nuclear-powered and then had to come up with an explanation for the design of each of them. Least expensive holiday gift i got her, and the best loved, I think. She carries them (it?) everywhere now.
customer_reviews.author: Erik the Red

customer_reviews.title: connect together nicely (don't come apart unless you pull)
customer_reviews.text: We bought a set of these that were ninjas in the past as well. They are well made, connect together nicely (don't come apart unless you pull), and each one has a different face. If you have a child that likes stacking or puzzle-type toys, they might like this, because you have to match the sizes and stack them within each other.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice FIRST nesting doll set!
customer_reviews.text: As yet unopened but seems like a great first nesting doll for a three year old boy!
customer_reviews.author: ~G.

customer_reviews.title: Would Purchase Again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Fang, Ninja, and Robot matryoshka madness nesting dolls for my boys, and they all love them. They are plastic, not wood, but I think they will hold up fine as long as no one goes out of their way to stomp on them or anything. My boys love pulling them all apart and setting them up and having little robot/ninja/monster wars with them. They also love that even the tiniest one opens up and they can hide a tiny treasure inside it.
customer_reviews.author: Momof6

customer_reviews.title: My son wanted these forever!
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, a bit thin. But my son enjoys them.
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH R.

customer_reviews.title: My kids enjoyed playing with these nesting dolls
customer_reviews.text: My kids enjoyed playing with these nesting dolls, but they are not metallic in color. They are plastic and are gray, not metallic like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: These little robots are so, so cool!
customer_reviews.text: These little robots are so, so cool! My husband surprised me with these little guys and they're just delightful. I actually keep them in the box because they are a fairly thin plastic and would not last long in the hands of my little terrors... ahem, I mean, children. But, they look fab on my display shelf next to all my other collectibles.
customer_reviews.author: The Abrahamson 6

customer_reviews.title: however they aren't quite as sturdy and durable as I would have hoped
customer_reviews.text: These served the purpose that we were looking for, however they aren't quite as sturdy and durable as I would have hoped, therefore they come apart easily and feel like they could break easily. Otherwise they are cute and my kids seem to like them.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Elliot

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun Christmas gift. However, I didn't realize that the toy is just a thin plastic shell; a bit thicker than a plastic Easter egg. I don't think it will last beyond the first adult accidentally stepping on it. Until then the kids enjoy taking it apart.
customer_reviews.author: Eric in Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Keeps our 2 year old occupied for 10-20 mins at a time
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to keep our 2 year old occupied on a long flight when we were going on holiday, and it did the job. He loves stacking the robots, role playing with the robots, and taking them appart. It keeps him occupied for a good 10-20 mins before he moves onto the next thing. It made the long trip much easier, and he played with them throughout the holiday
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Quayle

customer_reviews.title: 5 year olds favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Since my 5 year old son liked to play with a friends (much more expensive) nesting doll set, I thought he'd enjoy these. The easter bunny brought them for him and he has barely put them down since. He loves showing everyone how they work. They are very cute and seem pretty durable so far. He's now saying he wants Santa to bring him the Christmas version.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Toys
customer_reviews.text: I like robots and display toys this was perfect for that. They are just plastic but a good design and a twist on the Russian doll theme though the robot theme is what I was interested in. I like the product. It does what it says, arrived in good condition and able to use it for my purposed.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin D. Ricketts

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Pieces don't stay together. I guess more novelty than toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Burton

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about ordering this set of stacking robots because other customers had complained about thin plastic. This is actually very a durable and solid material. I have no qualms letting my grandchildren play with this set. It's really very cute and will be a fun addition to my toy closet, and I will buy more of these in the future without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT.
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THESE MADNESS ROBOTS FOR MY NEPHEWS 10TH B.D. I SPOKE TO HIM YESTERDAY, AND HE SAID HE JUST LOVES, LOVES, LOVES THEM.HE HAS A GREAT TIME TAKING THEM APART, AND LINING THEM UP. HE CAN'T GET OVER HOW THEY ALL FIT SO PERFECTLY TOGETHER. HE SAID HE ALSO HID THIS TWO DOLLARS INSIDE OF ONE OF THE ROBOTS. I ALSO SENT HIS SISTER ONE OF THE MATRYOSHKA WOODEN NESTING DILLS. SHE THOUGHT THEY WERE THE COOLEST THIS SHE EVER SAW. SHE IS 12 .
customer_reviews.author: evelyn towalski

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy for 5-yr-old.
customer_reviews.text: Smooth & easily fit together - the grandson loved them. Normally I would prefer wood over plastic, but the wood ones I got were cheap and had knots & splinters. These were shiny & cool.
customer_reviews.author: judytrillium

customer_reviews.title: Fun stocking Stuffer
customer_reviews.text: Ok, we love Robot toys, all Robot toys, so maybe I am biased. this was a nice stocking stuffer for someone in your family who loves Science Fiction or figurines and you have no idea what to get them. Its a cute bit of decor, and not much more, but it didn't get returned and actually stayed on a table for several days, which in this case is a massive win.
customer_reviews.author: E. B. NJ

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as the wooden ones
customer_reviews.text: These are plastic. Not as nice as the wooden ones. Design is good.
customer_reviews.author: Rosellen Schones

customer_reviews.title: Stacking robots
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 5 year old granddaughter. I put the smallest robot away as it could be a choke hazard to her toddler sister. Both enjoy playing with them and I pleased that they're substantial enough to not break easily.
customer_reviews.author: V. POTTER

customer_reviews.title: Can be made into a 7-doll nest with a tiny lego-head.
customer_reviews.text: Cute little guys. Definitely feels a bit cheap (because of the plastic) like others have said, but I'm guessing my 4-year old nephew will love them. The smallest one still has space inside of it (unlike most others I have seen), and I added a small lego head that looks like another robot head to make it a 7-doll nest.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves these. We have the ninjas set as well. Since they are plastic they are not easily damaged like the wooden nesting dolls. He can get them wet or whatever he wants. The smallest doll opens and I leave notes or small candies inside which adds to the fun every time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item sent. Looks nothing like pictured.
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited to get these robots and when we received them they were not what was pictured at all. They were green and a complete different style.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: good quality and painting
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good, both my 4 and 7 years old grandsons love it.
customer_reviews.author: Su Jen Li

customer_reviews.title: Love this toy!
customer_reviews.text: I have a huge robot collection, and when I came across these I had to have them. I wish they were made out of metal instead of plastic, but they are a lot of fun! All the pieces fit perfectly inside of one another, and the pictures on each robot are unique and different from one another. They go well with the rest of my collection. I would recommend this toy for anyone who is a collector or a kid that is old enough to not choke on the smallest robot.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Not silver as shown: more of a purple grey
customer_reviews.text: Would be a lot cuter if they were actually silver.
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I almost cancelled my order due to a bad review that said the largest was the size of an Easter egg! So not true. They are plastic but thicker then an egg. My 3 year old love them and try are unique and a great addition to our playroom!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Plastic. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: It's a lot of money for plastic. My bad for not noticing, but I'm disappointed at the cheap look of these.
customer_reviews.author: nw adventurer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ROBOTS
customer_reviews.text: These stacking robots are adorable and my preschooler freaked when he opened them. No cracks or breaks so far, looks to be pretty well made. Now if he can only not loose the smaller ones!
customer_reviews.author: CREER

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. -1 star because the quality could be better. But I don't regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Bakyt Niyazov

customer_reviews.title: Great, fun toy with some educational benefits
customer_reviews.text: My little boy neighbors loved our Russian matryoshka wooden nesting dolls, but when I was going to get them some for Christmas they were pretty pricey and I would worry about them playing with what really is a keepsake. These little nesting dolls were perfect! The loved fitting them together, and have to figure our sizes so it is educational, engaging their brains. I did not find them flimsy as others have suggested. Great gift and the guys loved the ninja and computer man themes.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Mac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the only book you need is the zhuang zi and tai chi or chi kung practice
customer_reviews.author: Alexei Goncharenko

customer_reviews.title: I think they are cute, if a bit small ...
customer_reviews.text: I think they are cute, if a bit small, but my grandson who is about to wear out our SPURS nesting dolls, didn't seem impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Kaput

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got this robot nesting doll for my son at Christmas from Santa because he liked taking my nesting doll apart and putting them back together. It's made of plastic so it's very durable and each doll has a different look so it's fun to create a robot army with them. My son is 4 and he plays with these often and now leaves mine alone.
customer_reviews.author: zetti5

customer_reviews.title: like the photo appears
customer_reviews.text: Not metallic, like the photo appears. Cool design but cheap plastic material. Would never buy this brand again
customer_reviews.author: Penny Marie

customer_reviews.title: Matryoshka Roboto
customer_reviews.text: I've had these robots on the 'to purchase' list for 2 years, and finally ordered them for the Holidays this year. Seriously, who can resist the concept of matryoshka robots? They're plastic, not wood like the familiar dolls, but they haven't broken and my son has enjoyed playing with them. You can put anything inside the bigger ones, a small car, coins, marbles. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Ordat

customer_reviews.title: Cool litttle robots
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty small and we have just been using them on a shelf so I have no idea on how they would hold up to play with but look cool in the sons room. They are made of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected. Read the reviews about size not being accurate, and the size is just as pictured. My toddler loved it!
customer_reviews.author: D Diaz

customer_reviews.title: QRONG PRODUCT RECEIVED!!!
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive the product. Instead received blue squeeze bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Kump

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Variation of the Nesting Dolls for Boys
customer_reviews.text: My kids love robots, so when I saw this, I had to get it for a road trip. It's held their attention for a surprisingly long time. Nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Two

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Plastic nesting dolls. My 4yr old LOVES them and will be getting more.
customer_reviews.author: Tisha Lipscomb

customer_reviews.title: Unique gift
customer_reviews.text: Cute gift, great decor for a boys room. Comes nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: hbmunchen

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loved it
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a stocking stuffer for my nephew, he likes the toy.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Everts

customer_reviews.title: Great matryoshka in Robot style but so small
customer_reviews.text: I'm satisfied with this product almost except one moment: these dolls are so small. The largest one is my hand length. But my 16 months old son is happy playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't agree more with reviewer 'Eric in Vegas'
customer_reviews.text: When I saw these online I just knew as much as I wanted the 'Monster' version my friend NEEDED these 'Robots' more and hey it was Christmas and giving is better than receiving, right! So what's the score here? While adorable they are cheaply made and overpriced by at least $5. Sadly this will be the last set I buy for me or anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get this for my son for christmas. But was even more dissapointed when it came. Thin plastic.. not gonna last long. And they come apart way to easily. I set it down and it opens up into a big mess. Wish it clicked closed better. Bummed out on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy.
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy and hard to find in stores. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: woody stove

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, great quality, the details are great and even the littlest robot comes apart and my son LOVES these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok and pricey
customer_reviews.text: It is cheap plastic and does not lock after few uses. I bought it for my son and he loves it. Good for a kid but definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: V. Challa

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: These nesting dolls are so cute. All the pieces fit together nicely, sometimes a problem in other nesting doll type things. Liked these quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: B.Milligan

customer_reviews.title: He loved it upon opening his gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift to my grandson. He loved it upon opening his gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lucien R. Beaudet

customer_reviews.title: Unique spin on tradition dolls
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! As a girl I used to enjoy my own traditional doll. I wanted something similar for my son and was pleased when I found this product. It arrived in a nice box, everything in good condition. The plastic isn't very sturdy but it isn't too thin either. My son enjoys playing with this product and I will definitely buy more as birthday and christmas gifts for others.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Nice matryoshka robots
customer_reviews.text: These were what you would expect; they are made from kind of cheap plastic, but they fit together nicely, and are fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: It was a very good quality toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my niece birthday gift. It was a very good quality toy. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Pop

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old has matroyoshka madness
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old has not put these down since Christmas. He is an active mechanical kind of kid. He loves the classic Sesame Street clip of the dolls stacking themselves and has been asking for stacking dolls for months. These are plastic and well made. They open and close easily for little hands and the graphics are amusing for both kids and adults. I was very happy with Santa's purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nc mom

customer_reviews.title: Madness indeed
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap plastic. Way too expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Igmoid Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My toddler likes playing with them but they are pretty cheap looking.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Shipping and packaging were great but the product was a nice surprise. It was even cuter than in the picture. I was a bit surprised at how small they were but am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: plastic
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a friend. They are pretty plasticy and the decals look like they will flake off eventually
customer_reviews.author: TreeFab

customer_reviews.title: good toy
customer_reviews.text: bought set of two... one for each boys and they LOVED it... I would buy again and highly recommend you buy
customer_reviews.author: Juliann

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I gave (the larger versions) to my one year old son! He loves opening and trying to close them up. Very cute!
customer_reviews.author: mar mar

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy... The kid i got it for digs it.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie Hembree

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My fault. Was expecting wood, not plastic. Grandson liked it nonetheless
customer_reviews.author: kenneth c davidson

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a 3 year old!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how much my son liked these, I thought he would like it, play with once or twice, and it would be more of a decorative item; but he likes to sit and regroup them over and over - it seems too simple for how sophisticated children are today, but he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Flynn

customer_reviews.title: I have these robots in my office and one of ...
customer_reviews.text: I have these robots in my office and one of my kids loves them and will be thrilled to receive this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: vlura

customer_reviews.title: The biggest is way to small--- small and cheap--- I just tossed them.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money, I bought two. Very cheap and way to small thats the reason for the pic in description no having a child in it so you could scale its size. plastic is thin, size is to small. I through both away. the largest is the size of an easter egg.
customer_reviews.author: AvgJill

customer_reviews.title: great for boys!
customer_reviews.text: my son fell in love with the nesting dolls at the doctors office, but I didn't want to get him the traditional "girlie" dolls. These we perfect! thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: Made of such thin plastic, that they barely hold together. Purchased because of a recommendation in Parenting Magazine. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: pittpanther

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality and Late
customer_reviews.text: All these people who are so pleased with delivery must only live in the UK! In the States, this came late -- after Christmas. It is also rather of poor quality. I should have read the fine print! :-(
customer_reviews.author: Georgean

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of the size and material
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that this toy is made of thin plastic, like the small plastic Easter eggs that fit together. Also, it is rather small for a nesting doll. It is unique and the grandchildren seem to enjoy it even if I was a little disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Avidreader

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are a dull grey plastic, not shiny/metallic like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: NPH

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: the only thing my boys didn't like is that the smallest one opens too. it made them feel like there should be another in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. My youngest son as a sci-fi theme to his room. These are a novel idea. They really tied the room together.
customer_reviews.author: mathew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A fun spin on an old traditional item. Great gift.
customer_reviews.author: William Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great little gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little gift for boys, it's made from plastic, which I thought was great, my grandsons loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Our 3 year old grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.text: This nesting set is made of plastic and is a lot of fun for our grandson. We hope the pieces are not too small.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine M. Sagan

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: now i don't have to let my 3 year old play with my wooden nesting dolls. he has his own. he loves taking them apart and putting them back together
customer_reviews.author: jillest

customer_reviews.title: Plastic?
customer_reviews.text: I've never thought these things came made of plastic. That was a bit of a disappointment. If they were wood, I would have been much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Heginbotham

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the product. I did not know that is was going to be a THIN plastic. Not durable at all. Very Cheapy looking. All the others that were ordered from elsewhere, were wood.... Now I have 1 that I can't give away for the holiday, because its too cheapy looking. How sad.
customer_reviews.author: happy label

product_meta.title: Matryoshka Madness Robot
product_meta.description:
Set of six nesting Robots from space!.... Sci-fi inspired Bots from another planet!

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Robot six piece nesting doll with exciting graphics. Six Nesting Robots from outer space, looking for intelligent life on earth. Nest all together, or display all six. A traditional old toy re-invented for the 21st century. Collect them all.
feature_bullets: Nest all six matryoshkas together or display all six

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars177 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
